title: AI-Powered Code Review Agent
subtitle: 82% reduction in approval time, 24% reduction in cycle time
description: Led research, testing, and rollout of AI-powered merge request review system
fullDescription: Led the complete lifecycle of implementing an AI-powered merge request review agent, from initial research through production deployment. Partnered cross-functionally with engineering and DevOps teams to integrate the system into the CI pipeline. The implementation resulted in an 82% reduction in time to approve and a 24% reduction in overall cycle time, significantly improving developer productivity.
achievements: 82% reduction in merge request approval time
24% reduction in overall development cycle time
Seamless integration with existing CI pipeline
Cross-functional collaboration with engineering and DevOps

title: High-Volume Request Processing System
subtitle: Critical services handling ~2000 requests per minute
description: Developed and maintained critical services for high-traffic applications
fullDescription: Developed and maintained critical services handling approximately 2000 requests per minute, ensuring high availability and performance for mission-critical applications. Implemented robust monitoring, error handling, and scaling strategies to maintain service reliability under heavy load.

title: WebRTC Image Quality Scoring System
subtitle: Vehicle damage assessment with real-time image analysis
description: Architected and led development of image quality scoring for vehicle damage capture
fullDescription: Architected and led the development of an innovative image quality scoring system used in conjunction with WebRTC for capturing vehicle damage images. The system provided real-time feedback to users about image quality, ensuring high-quality data collection for insurance claims processing. This project significantly improved the accuracy and efficiency of damage assessment workflows.
achievements: Real-time image quality assessment for insurance claims
Improved accuracy of vehicle damage documentation
Seamless integration with WebRTC video capture
Enhanced user experience with immediate feedback

title: Legacy System Migration & GraphQL Implementation
subtitle: Modern email service with enhanced API functionality
description: Engineered migration from legacy system to modern email service with GraphQL
fullDescription: Engineered the complete migration of a legacy email system to a modern, scalable email service. Led the implementation of GraphQL to enhance API functionality, providing more flexible and efficient data querying capabilities. The project improved system maintainability, performance, and developer experience while maintaining backward compatibility during the transition.
achievements: Successfully migrated legacy email system without downtime
Implemented GraphQL for enhanced API functionality
